Module cz.zcu.kiv.ir.silhavyj.searchengine
Package cz.zcu.kiv.ir.silhavyj.searchengine.index

Class Index

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.ir.silhavyj.searchengine.index.Index
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IIndex
    public class Index
extends java.lang.Object
implements IIndex
    Author:
    Jakub Silhavy This class represents an inverted index. It is filled during preprocessing and havily used when evaluating a query.
